Package game.items.weapons

Class Scimitar

java.lang.Object
game.engine.items.Item
game.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.items.weapons.Scimitar
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Weapon, Purchasable, Sellable
public class Scimitar
extends WeaponItem
implements Sellable, Purchasable
Scimitar is a weapon that can be purchased and sold from MerchantKale 118 damage and 88% hit rate
Author:
Ho Seng Modified by: Harshath Muruganantham, Ziheng Liao
See Also:
WeaponItem, Sellable, Purchasable
